des:
Evapolar Smart Home Skill is made to arrange voice management of your Evapolar climate devices.

First of all, you should link with your Evapolar account
Detailed instructions on how to do it:
https://tinyurl.com/evapolar-al

You can use the following commands to control your Evapolar devices:

1. Alexa, turn on the eva Home.
2. Alexa, turn off the eva Honey.
3. Alexa, set the eva Smart fan speed to 7.
4. Alexa, turn up the eva Honey fan speed.
5. Alexa, decrease the fan speed on the eva Honey by 3.
6. Alexa, what is the eva Smart fan speed?
7. Alexa, change Eva Smart light to blue.
8. Alexa, set the eva Smart light to fifty percent.
9. Alexa, dim eva Smart light twenty five percent.
10. Alexa, turn on night mode on the eva Smart.
11. Alexa, turn off night mode on the eva Smart.
12. Alexa, is night mode on for the eva Honey?

For more information about Evapolar skills for Amazon Alexa, visit https://tinyurl.com/evapolar-alexa
